title: jai jai dEvi
sahitya:
jaya jaya dEvi jai jai janani jai jai sarasvati mAyI


caraNam 1    jai jai bhavAni jai sharvAni jai tribhuvan sukhdAyi 
tErO hi mAyA anant apAr ayArA jAku kOyi nahi pAyI
    caraNam 2    hasta kamal mO bIn virAjE jAnEn sab sur gAyi
dUsarO hAth virAjat pustak vEd shruti upjAyi
    caraNam 3    tErO rE rUp bhayO sab vidyA sur aur caranN manAyi
padmanAbh prabhu caraN sarUruh sEvak kE man bhAyi
